content: wrap a special baby in cozy comfort with the nordic star baby blanket this mosaic crochet baby blanket has a timeless nordic charm that feels just right for baby s first christmas but it s also classic enough to use all year long a beautiful handmade gift filled with warmth and love the pattern comes with written instructions and a chart as well as link to a video tutorial for the overlay mosaic crochet technique everything you need to create some holiday magic for your favorite little one unique features- stunning nordic star design worked in overlay mosaic crochet super cozy layered fabric for ultimate warmth detailed written pattern with crochet chart timeless design perfect for an heirloom baby gift materials needed- stitch markers hook 5mm us size h/8 yarn worsted weight approx 920 yards gauge 14 stitches x 17 row in 4 x 4 square
